welcome_message_body: Welcome to Umm Salal `Ali, Qatar! This charming city is known for its rich history and beautiful architecture. We invite you to explore and experience all that it has to offer and enjoy your time here.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for regional and low-cost carriers.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A new terminal currently under construction, expected to open in 2022.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Al Udeid AB Airport, serving both civilian and military operations.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The separate terminal for military operations at Al Udeid AB Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
